content.title: West Bengal Handloom and Khadi Weavers Financial Benefit Scheme 2024: Support for One Time Settlement (OTS) of NPA Accounts of PWCS
content.department: Micro, Small & Medium Enterprise and Textiles Department
content.details: The scheme aims to make PWCS debt free by providing financial support for One Time Settlement (OTS) of NPA accounts of PWCS.
content.application_process: Eligible PWCs/Khadi society/Individual Weaver can apply either online or offline in the prescribed format before the Director, Textiles.

faqs.question: What is the definition of 'PWCS'?
faqs.answer: 'PWCS' means the Primary Weavers’ Cooperative Societies registered under the West Bengal Cooperative Societies Act.

faqs.question: What is the extent of financial support provided by the State Government?
faqs.answer: The State Government will extend financial support to clear 100% overdue principal amount +25% overdue interest amount as on 31/03/2024 of the NPA account of viable and potentially viable PWCS.

faqs.question: How will the remaining overdue interest and penal interest be managed?
faqs.answer: The balance 75% overdue interest and the penal interest, if any, shall be written off by the West Bengal State Cooperative Bank Ltd./ District Central Cooperative Bank Ltd. of the concerned Districts.

faqs.question: Which department is the management authority for this scheme?
faqs.answer: The Scheme will be implemented and monitored by the Micro, Small & Medium Enterprise and Textiles Department.

faqs.question: What process will be followed for the administration of this scheme?
faqs.answer: The Committee will scrutinize and examine the claim proposals and will cause Field Enquiry, if necessary.

faqs.question: What measures are in place to prevent misuse of the Welfare Assistance?
faqs.answer: In case of any misrepresentation of facts or furnishing false information by an applicant, all claims under the scheme shall be revoked.

faqs.question: Will similar benefits under existing schemes continue to operate?
faqs.answer: Yes, an eligible PWC/Khad Society which has availed of incentive/subsidy under any other scheme prior to this scheme shall be eligible to get the benefits under this scheme.

faqs.question: Is an eligible PWC/Khadi Society that has already received an incentive or subsidy still eligible?
faqs.answer: Yes, they shall be eligible to get the benefits under this scheme.

faqs.question: How will the Grievance Redressal Mechanism operate?
faqs.answer: In case of grievances against the decision of the Directorate of Textiles, application is to be made to the Principal Secretary, Department of MSME&T.

faqs.question: What is the date of commencement and duration of this scheme?
faqs.answer: This scheme was launched on 7th March, 2024 and will remain in force for five years.

faqs.question: How can the benefits be availed?
faqs.answer: An eligible PWCs/Khadi society/Individual Weaver will apply in the prescribed format before the Director, Textiles.

faqs.question: What is the frequency of the assistance?
faqs.answer: The assistance will be provided one time to the beneficiaries.

faqs.question: What is the definition of 'Societies'?
faqs.answer: 'Societies' means and includes PWCS, Handloom Clusters, JLG groups, Handloom Groups.

faqs.question: What is the definition of 'Khadi Society'?
faqs.answer: 'Khadi Society' means Society Registered under Co-operative Societies Act / Official Trustees Act / Societies Act/ Partnership Firm/ Company's Act etc. who are involved/ engaged in handloom/ khadi related activities.
